sentences.sentence: So it is not necessary to use a broad-band laser to guarantee excitation efficiency for an atom with hyperfine split levels.
sentences.translation: 因此，在这样激光功率条件下，为提高原子激发效率而增加激光谱线宽度的做法并不是必要的。
